title: Hardwoods of Papua New Guinea
creator_credit: Don Murray, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Bruce Moir
brief_description: The film surveys timber developments showing logging, milling, paper-pulp making, and chip mills. Also shown is the work of the Forest Products Research Centre which provides technological assistance and re-afforestation [sic] programs.
creator_credit_for_label: Don Murray, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Bruce Moir
